architectural_elements.name: Four-Poster Bed
architectural_elements.description: A grand, ornate bed with tattered curtains, rumpled sheets, and a dusty mattress. The bedposts may have carvings or strange symbols.

architectural_elements.name: High Ceil2ing with Moldings
architectural_elements.description: Decorative ceiling moldings with cracks, peeling paint, and cobwebs.

architectural_elements.name: Large Windows
architectural_elements.description: Tall, arched windows with heavy, moth-eaten curtains. Moonlight filters through, casting eerie shadows.

architectural_elements.name: Fireplace
architectural_elements.description: A grand but unused fireplace with soot stains, a cracked mantel, and possibly ghostly embers.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Floorboards
architectural_elements.description: Creaky, warped floorboards with gaps, stains, or mysterious scratches.

furniture_and_decor.name: Vanity Table
furniture_and_decor.description: An antique vanity with a cracked mirror, tarnished silver brushes, and half-used perfume bottles.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wardrobe
furniture_and_decor.description: A large, ornate wardrobe with tattered clothes inside. The doors may creak or refuse to stay closed.

furniture_and_decor.name: Nightstands
furniture_and_decor.description: Small tables on either side of the bed, holding half-burned candles, old books, or a rusty key.

furniture_and_decor.name: Armchair
furniture_and_decor.description: A plush but worn armchair near the fireplace, covered in dust or cobwebs.

furniture_and_decor.name: Full-Length Mirror
furniture_and_decor.description: A standing mirror with a gilded frame, possibly cracked or showing ghostly reflections.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs draped across the furniture, bedposts, and corners of the room.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Floating in the air, visible in shafts of moonlight or candlelight.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: Candles or lamps that flicker unpredictably, casting shifting shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Whispers
atmospheric_details.description: Faint whispers, the sound of breathing, or a voice calling from the wardrobe or under the bed.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Spots
atmospheric_details.description: Areas in the room that feel unnaturally cold, possibly with visible breath.

interactive_objects.name: Diary or Journal
interactive_objects.description: A leather-bound journal on the nightstand or vanity, containing clues or disturbing entries.

interactive_objects.name: Locket or Jewelry Box
interactive_objects.description: A small box or locket on the vanity, containing a photograph, a key, or a supernatural artifact.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Pocket Watch
interactive_objects.description: A pocket watch hidden in a drawer or under the pillow, tied to a time-based puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Portrait
interactive_objects.description: A painting of a past resident, with eyes that follow the player or a face that changes expression.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Compartment
interactive_objects.description: A secret drawer or panel in the wardrobe or under the bed, containing a key, letter, or other important item.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Curtains or bedsheets gently moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, especially around the bed or fireplace.

environmental_effects.name: Bloodstains or Handprints
environmental_effects.description: Mysterious stains on the sheets, walls, or floor, hinting at past violence.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Ash or Petals
environmental_effects.description: Ash from the fireplace or dried petals drifting down from the ceiling.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Streaming through the windows, casting long, eerie shadows across the room.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Flickering candles on the nightstands, vanity, or fireplace mantel, creating a ghostly ambiance.

lighting.name: Fireplace Glow
lighting.description: A faint, ghostly glow from the fireplace, even if it's not lit.
